item.description:
Just a reminder in addition to my e-mail the other day.  The official date of our next meeting is Thursday, March 15th (not the 20th) at 7:00 PM.

See you then!

 

Betsy

PS If anyone wants a free laser touch one demo (removes trigger points and increases deep healing circulation for pain relief) just contact me at 623-251-7547 until March 13th and at 617-943-5570 from the 14th on.  I can do demos before the meeting or for a short while after or you can come see me at my office in Reading.  Demos are free of charge of course.  Most of my fibro clients get a great deal of relief from this device.  In AZ LaserTouch One can barely keep these units on the shelf. 93% of clients get positive results within 4-6 minutes.

I also have LifeWave patches which you can try out for pain and inflammation, tissue repair and detoxification.   Positive results are 90% with these products.  I use both products daily in my practice and on myself.

 

(Small donations help me to defray the costs of this meetup - thanks)
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs. There is an elevator on the right as you come in on the first level
item.name: Time for a meetup
